parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: An array of integers, representing user ids.

parameter.name: match
parameter.description: An array of strings. This works just like 'user matching' in Bugzilla itself.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Limit the number of users matched by the match parameter.

parameter.name: groupIds
parameter.description: An array of numeric ids for groups that a user can be in.

parameter.name: groups
parameter.description: An array of names of groups that a user can be in.

parameter.name: includeDisabled
parameter.description: By default, when using the match parameter, disabled users are excluded from the returned results unless their full username is identical to the match string

parameter.name: includeFields
parameter.description: An array of strings, representing the names of fields in the return value. Only the fields specified in this hash will be returned.

parameter.name: excludeFields
parameter.description: An array of strings, representing the names of fields in the return value. The fields specified will not be included in the returned hashes.
